attributes.action: Cancel NHS nurses & junior doctors' tuition fee debt who are fighting COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
Many nurses and doctors working for the NHS right now are putting their lives and those of their loved ones on the line to fight COVID-19. Our medical professionals are working relentlessly to save lives and are not adequately recognised for their sacrifices and service. 

It is appalling that nurses and doctors joining the NHS workforce pay tuition fees in the first place. They accumulate significant debt to provide a vital service to the country. The COVID-19 crisis has highlighted this.
attributes.background: Cancel all tuition fee debt for nurses and junior doctors who are currently working for the NHS to fight the Corona Virus and save lives. This will give recognition for their service to this country at this time and ensure the government acknowledges their value and sacrifice.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, calling for similar actions:

Clear student debts for all newly qualified & final year medical students:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314334

Write off all student loans for all NHS staff fighting COVID19:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310559

Reduce student debt for student nurses and midwives: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300079

Suspend student loan repayments for doctors, nurses and midwives during COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308456

Forgive student debt of all key workers after Pandemic crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307985

Fund all medical degrees to support future doctors and nurses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309404

Reimburse nurses for student loans and fund all fees for future student nurses:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302732
